review.comment: The food is so good! Perfect portions, fresh, and easy to heat up. The delivery was on time and food was delivered with care. The prices are great. I will definitely be ordering more with this company, makes my life so much easier. I’m very pleased with my experience and would highly recommend!
Great food, awesome service!

Every meal that I have gotten so far has been wonderful! This is a great service, it feels so nice not to cook or clean when I order these meals and they are also very tasty! My favorites so far being the boom boom burger special, any of their overnight oats and protein pancakes. Truly delicious and a must try!

Ordering was very simple! I had my first delivery and I was very impressed by the fact that they text you to notify you when your order is coming and you can track their route in real time. Our driver was so nice and very informative… a great first impression. It was well packed and since my friend and I both ordered these meals for the office, I loved that it has our names on the labels so we don’t mix them up! The food is SO FRESH and delicious and you can either choose meals they suggest or custom build what you want! In my opinion, it is WELL worth the price knowing I don’t have to go grocery shopping and “meal prep” where I’d be eating the same meal ALL WEEK for not much of a price difference. Very happy so far!

Edibolic Kitchen is not only delicious, but it is affordable feel-good food. I have been ordering from them for a little over a year and I have not had a single negative experience.  Every interaction I have had with the team has always been very positive. Edibolic kitchen has been instrumental in helping me get my life and my health back on track. I suggest this service to anyone and everyone. If you're unsure, try it. You will not be disappointed. Thanks E.K!
review.review_reply: Thank you Chris! We appreciate your continued trust and patronage!

review.comment: The best meal delivery service I've had. The meals are tasty and well prepared, service is great. An excellent choice if you are looking for a meal service.

They use cheese and sauses and turkey bacon so it's not quite as clean as baked chicken and rice but its dramatically more palatable and much better than I would make for myself, it tastes fresh, the chicken and steak are always tender and flavorful, meals are well thought out and prepared, I've ordered 20 meals a week for close to a year and they've never missed a delivery and had maybe 2 meals that were not correct. I've tried a similar meal prep service and found most of their meals chewy and un palatable. Between these meals and a few shakes a day, I can easily track my macros, I control my body fat with how much peanut butter goes in the shakes and my diet for the most part stays the same. The breakfast burritos need an update but honestly that's probably my biggest gripe. Best I've tried, definitely worth the money for me. Worth every star
This is some of the best tasting food I have EVER had. I truly love it and would recommend it to anyone!!! They make the pick up in West Haven super easy and fast. I love it!
Great option for meal prep. Local places to pick up my weeks order. Reasonably priced. Great variety with food choices to meet dietary restrictions

I am so very greatful for Edibolic Kitchen! I am in a place in my life where filling my fridge with healthy prepared meals is improving my quality of life. When I order my meals for the week I have such security in knowing that I will have great variety and that the food that I'm putting in my body is healthy. Not having to worry about creating a menu or food prep has decreased my anxiety around healthy eating significantly. Their website is user-friendly, intuitive and easy to navigate. I enjoy having choices for breakfast, lunch and dinner and all of the food thus far has been delicious! The bonus for me is that it is also very economical. I ordered 11 meals plus tip and shipping for under $200. I can easily drop that amount on one night out. It is worth every penny.
I count on Edibolic for my weekly delivery of the precise macro nutrients I need in my nutritional program...they never let me down

I was introduced to Josh at Edibolic Kitchen to help me maintain a weight loss program. I ordered prepared meals which were fresh and delicious and delivered to my door.
I can't say enough about the quality and taste and presentation. They offer an awesome variety of foods . I can honestly say they the best!!
I've been using these guys for the past 2 to 3 years and I have not had a single bad experience.  Are usually order at least 18 meals a week making consistency, fitness and life dramatically easier!

Good choices are great and tasty! Macros all listed and weekly specials are always a nice switch up and something to look forward to. If you’re anything like me and get bored with eating and prepping the same thing to eat for days on end then I recommend giving Edibolic Kitchen a try!

Edibolic and the owner Josh are great.  Food is fantastic and consistent and their delivery process is spot on, which is hard to come by with meal services like this.  Any small issues I’ve ever had they go above and beyond and then some to make sure they make things right.  Have been using them for a couple years now.
Amazing and healthy food !
ALWAYS FANTASTIC food and GREAT quality !!

Edibolic Kitchen has been the BEST find!! I used to spend an entire day of the weekend meal prepping for the upcoming week because I want healthy choices for my family but don’t have the time to cook like that during the week. Everything is perfectly portioned with all of the nutritional information you need on the label! The food is healthy and delicious and my family loves it!! Thank you for helping me get my Sundays back and my family fed!

This Service is a life saver! The meals are really great making my diet and busy lifestyle so much more manageable. The owner of the location, Josh is super professional and friendly, always quick to accommodate or help the customer. For example, I was rear ended on 91 north last night and due to circumstance Josh offered to have my meals delivered to my house at no additional cost, my meals are always ready on time for pickup and they have many pick up locations to choose from. I like that every week they always alternate about 5 meals or so giving you the ability to keep it different! I recommend this service to anyone i know personally looking for this type of service. They also cook the meals usually the morning of delivery keeping them as fresh as possible for me which does not go unnoticed, Keep doing what you guys are doing it does not go unappreciated !

Edibolic Kitchen has a decent selection of meals every week. At times, some of the meals can be a bit bland, but that can easily be fixed with some salt or a sauce. It's very easy to place orders and customize your own meals if the weekly specials don't interest you. The food is always delivered on time. If you're looking to save some time with meal prepping, I recommend you try Edibolic Kitchen.
Great food choices and great service!!!
Great service and food is great. You won't regret going to them.
The food is excellent. Great menu, easy to order. Service is aways 5 stars!  Josh and his team are awesome!  Home delivery is always when promised.

I saw the Ebolic store in West Haven and wondered what it was about. Ended up coming home, looking them up online and I have been ordering all different things every week at convenient pick up points. Everything I have ordered has been great portions , a great price, and everything tastes great!

Been getting meals from Edibolic Kitchen for a couple of years now.  Food quality and taste is always exceptional.  And their customer service is outstanding.  It's a great way to have healthy meals ready after a very long day at work.

I am a current college student and an active athlete; Edibolic Kitchen has given me nothing but amazing overall service.  The food is healthy, fresh and tasty. The owner (Josh) has always been very helpful when it comes to my food orders, particularly  avoiding specific foods that I am allergic to as well.  I would recommend this place to everyone.. the food is amazing and their customer service is even better!
I've been using meal services for the past 8 years and Edibolic is my favorite this far.  Great variety, food is always fresh and deliveries are the most consistent.  Can't go wrong!

Ive been a customer for a year every single time something was wrong:
Turkey chilli not fully cooked
Lying about what gyms there delivering to while on their page the gyms are listed
Spending a hot day driving to 3 different locations then waiting an hour to recieve my meal
Hearing the owner tell a gym owner they dont deliver there anymore while the Crossfit gym is on their list
The final straw him telling me to drive around Hartford for my meals.
I have a hard time believing his reviews werent bought!!!..... no you told me to meet him in rocky hill also it wasnt the 1st time it happened. Remember when i went to multiple locations to get my meals then waited at Brandford for 2hours for you
review.review_reply:
Hi Fedeline,
I’m very sorry for your experience.
All items are temped before being taken of the stove or out of the oven. Our turkey chili is slow cooked on the stove top for a minimum of 2 hours and brought well above the 165 degree temperature threshold. As for the gym delivery situation, during the pandemic we have lost a number of partnered gyms from closures. The one in particular you are referring to actually switched owners at some point over the last couple months and we were never alerted. The gym owner told you, that we didn’t deliver there anymore but we had never been informed. When you called us looking for your order I immediately contacted our driver. I called back right away and mentioned that he was slightly behind and suggested as a courtesy to you that he could veer off his route and meet you on your way back home as to not make you wait. Your response was I don’t like to drive and asked to cancel your order. I happily did this right then and thought we had rectified the situation.

review.comment: Delicious food at a great price!

We love ordering meals from edibolic kitchen.  The food is always amazing.  It makes it easy to make healthy choices without all the prep work.
Thank you for helping our family led a healthy lifestyle.
Tasty way to eat clean and healthy 🙂

This is a GREAT service..If one doesn't like to cook for themselves. It's beyond Blue Apron, Plate It, etc. All food is prepared fresh, organic when available, customizable, and NOT frozen. No preparation required like the others. Just heat and serve. No defrosting. Combine with a salad and soup, and it's a super easy way to get low sodium, low/no sugar, complex carbs and lean high protein into one's diet. With nearly zero effort. For me, this business is a godsend. I eat super healthy with little effort. And my last blood chem report seems to support this. In the beginning, Josh actually sat down with me and discussed my specific nutritional needs. Super helpful. Give them a try. No meal plans where you must buy so many meals. Order a few meals, and if you're not happy, there's no further obligation! Now it's easy to take a small nutritious meal to the office, toss into the microwave and still eat very well.
Incredibly tasty food to the point where I can’t believe I’m actually eating healthy.   Great portions and variety and service is A++.
Delicious food!

Great tasting and healthy food prepared by chefs who are truly masters of their craft! Plenty of delicious variety’s to choose from or customize your own meals. The staff provides great service and personalization, taking the time to get to know the individual.
